SongLyrics.JpnStr: 続[つづ]く 時間[じかん]の欠片[かけら]を集[あつ]めている ただ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm just gathering the fragments of passing time.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 過[す]ぎるノートの余白[よはく]に書[か]く「答[こた]えは、いつ?」
SongLyrics.EngStr: I write in the margins of the passing notebook, 'When is the answer?'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほんのり小[ちい]さな感情[かんじょう]へ
SongLyrics.EngStr: To a faint, small feeling.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]をひとつ またねまたね
SongLyrics.EngStr: One love, see you later, see you later.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]に咲[さ]く温度[おんど]と灯[とも]るまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until the warmth blooms in the night and lights up.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 呼吸[こきゅう]ひとつ 生[い]きる生[い]きる
SongLyrics.EngStr: One breath, live, live.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しい日々[ひび]の横[よこ]で泣[な]かぬように 嗚呼[ああ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I don't cry next to those gentle days, ah.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 泣[な]かぬように
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I don't cry.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ちっちゃな言葉[ことば]チクチクしたの キリが無[な]いけどさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Small, prickling words. They never end, but...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それを忘[わす]れたフリ疲[つか]れたよ 夜[よる]よ抱[だ]きしめて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm tired of pretending to forget it. Night, please hold me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今日[きょう]だって 笑[わら]う笑[わら]う 泣[な]いちゃう僕[ぼく]を隠[かく]すために笑[わら]う
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even today, I smile, smile, to hide the crying me, I smile.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 言[い]えないことは言[い]えないで良[い]いって思[おも]えたら軽[かる]くなれるのかな
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I could think 'it's okay not to say what can't be said,' would it feel lighter?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]をひとつ またねまたね
SongLyrics.EngStr: One love, see you later, see you later.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]に咲[さ]く温度[おんど]と灯[とも]るまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until the warmth blooms in the night and lights up.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 呼吸[こきゅう]ひとつ 生[い]きる生[い]きる
SongLyrics.EngStr: One breath, live, live.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しい日々[ひび]の横[よこ]で泣[な]かぬように
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I don't cry next to those gentle days.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]をひとつ またねまたね 嗚呼[ああ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: One love, see you later, see you later, ah.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]をひとつ またねまたね
SongLyrics.EngStr: One love, see you later, see you later.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しい日々[ひび]の横[よこ]で笑[わら]うように 嗚呼[ああ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: So I can smile next to those gentle days, ah.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 吐[は]き出[だ]す気持[きも]ちは簡単[かんたん]で
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's easy to spit out feelings.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: でも生[い]きるの難易度[なんいど]高[たか]すぎて
SongLyrics.EngStr: But the difficulty of living is too high.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうにも解[と]けない問[とい]だらけ 嗚呼[ああ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: There are just too many unsolvable questions, ah.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: さっぱりきっかり前[まえ]向[む]いて なんてしなくて良[い]いから抱[だ]きしめて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't need to be perfectly facing forward, just hold me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 愛[あい]をひとつ またねまたね
SongLyrics.EngStr: One love, see you later, see you later.

ListVocab: 抱きしめる-だきしめる
